content: fiddly bits ​ by hipknitizer ​ materials ​ 2 size 3 - 24 circular knitting needles stitch marker crochet hook & tapestry needle worsted weight scrap yarn for cast on sock yarn bits & pieces - crazy is good instructions join sock yarn bits with square knots i used 6 - 6 yard lengths alternating randomly you can add more yarn later on if the original ball runs out before you re finished cast on 90 stitches with the scrap yarn using the provisional crochet ​ ​ chain method place marker and join in the round careful not to twist begin knitting *it is necessary to untie and re-knot the yarn bits every 6 or so tightening carefully to avoid holes in your work pull knots and stray ends inside the tube with a crochet hook * to complete the tube place beginning live stitches on the 2nd circular needle use the kitchener stitch to graft the live stitches together on both sets of needles careful not to twist block lightly wrap artistically and enjoy the compliments
